summary: This bill, the ESOP Funding for SBA Position Act of 2025, aims to help small businesses establish employee stock ownership plans (ESOPs). It mandates the Small Business Administration (SBA) to create a dedicated position providing guidance on ESOP setup, including tax, regulatory, and funding aspects. The bill outlines responsibilities of the position, including coordinating with public/private entities and advocating for clear guidance from relevant agencies. It also requires annual reporting to Congress on the program's activities and authorizes appropriations, including $500,000 for the first year.
